page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE-GREAT HAYWOOD.
page.content: My name is Andrew Mellows. I am 11 years old and I live at 7, Abbey Drive, Little Haywood. I go to St. John's School Great Haywood. My dad is a greengrocer. I have 1 brother and 1 sister. My brother is 9 years old, my sister is 4 years old. My mum is a housewife. We have a few rules like, no feet on the furniture, no eating in the lounge. I have two responsibilities in my house. I have to feed my pet and I have to tidy my bedroom. I like to play snooker, football and cricket. I go to bed at 9.30 and I get up at 7.30. I catch a bus at 8.40am. School begins at 9.00am and finishes at 3.45p.m.
